definition: quilt cover/to have money stuck (in stocks, real estate etc)

quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a one-step forming device for quilt covers, which belongs to the technical field of cotton goods processing devices.
sentences.chinese: 被套一次性成形设备，属于棉制品加工设备技术领域。

sentences.english: Creative duvet cover designed for people who study anatomy.
sentences.chinese: 为学习解剖学的人设计的创意被套。

sentences.english: I remember the quilt cover also other cold.
sentences.chinese: 我记得被套还有其他冷。
他们被套上了婚姻的枷锁。

sentences.english: One horse and one cow were teamed to a plow.
sentences.chinese: 一匹马一头牛被套在犁上。

sentences.english: There is no bedsheet and quilt cover here.
sentences.chinese: 搬进来了，没有床单和被套。

sentences.english: What they are promoting is the Blanket Cover plus the Blanket, both are 100% silk as claimed.
sentences.chinese: 此秦锦堂所推广的是真丝被套和被褥。

sentences.english: Limited edition duvet covers with sleeves.
The fox was caught in the trap.
They all had a transparent plastic bag on their heads.
sentences.chinese: 他们的头都被套上透明的塑胶袋。

sentences.english: Holding the 2 far corners of the duvet, push the duvet into the duvet cover.
sentences.chinese: 捏住鸭绒被的两个角，把鸭绒被塞进被套里。

definition: to immobilize with a lasso/to be trapped in the stock market
market price/quotation of market price/the current market situation
to dump (selling abroad more cheaply than cost price at home)
the only son of a family/(functional programming or philosophy) monad
to take an inventory of stock/to clear out one's stock
